payload.llm_output:
- Ensure that the features extracted are relevant to the product and can be used to distinguish it from other products.
- Avoid including generic features that could apply to any product.
- Be specific and precise in naming the features. For example, instead of just saying "size", specify whether it's the height, width, or length.
- If possible, include the range or limits of the features. For example, instead of just saying "temperature", specify the operating temperature range.
- When extracting features from the part number, make sure they are actual features and not just part of the product's identification code.
- Be consistent in the format and units used for the features. For example, if one feature is given in millimeters, don't give another feature in inches.
- If the product has any certifications or complies with any standards, these can also be included as features.
